alert.note: Alert for Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 8:44PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL BIG HORN... NORTHEASTERN YELLOWSTONE...SOUTHEASTERN MUSSELSHELL AND CENTRAL TREASURE COUNTIES THROUGH 930 PM MDT... At 843 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles north of Worden, or 26 miles southeast of Roundup, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail and torrential rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hysham, Custer, and Bighorn. This advisory does not include the city of Billings. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Treasure
